#Add population data to dat
dat2 = left_join(dat, pop_dat, by = c("iso3c")) %>%
  select(-c("country2")) %>%
  mutate(pop = ifelse(Country == "Taiwan", 23780000, pop)) %>%
  mutate(pop = ifelse(Country == "South Sudan", 12580000, pop)) %>%
  mutate(pop = ifelse(Country == "Kosovo", 1831000, pop)) %>%
  mutate(cases_per_mil = Confirmed*1000000/pop)
